content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my delivery truck north bound on i94 around the osseo, wi area.  this was exactly 1 week before thanksgiving approximately around 2004 or 2005.

it was a crisp fall day, not a cloud in the sky, the sun was behind me over my left shoulder, when the sun's light reflected off something metallic in the sky.  my first reaction was that of an airplane off in the distance.  it was, or seemed to be, a considerable distance away.

then i could tell it was not on any flight path, just hovering motionless.  i focused more intently on it and observed it to be in a disc or saucer shape.  

while driving through a hilly area and curves in the road i occasionally lost sight of it, but coming back into view whenever the road straightened out.  nothing had changed, still silver and hovering in same place.

next time my view was obscured i was unable to pick up the object again.

this event was repeated as i will note in a follow-up report.
content.summary: While driving, sunlight reflected off metallic object in a clear blue, cloudless sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Winter, snow on ground, neighborhood kids outside playing.  i was approximately 8-10 y/o.  approximately 9 pm, most kids called inside by their parents.  i and another boy a year or 2 younger than myself remained outside.  we laid down on our backs to look up at the night sky, watching all the stars.  it was a very clear evening with no clouds obstructing our view.

there seemed to be one spot in the sky where the stars were not visible, making a black hole where there should have been stars.  suddenly a light came on directly above us, casting no light down on us, but defining a shape i can only describe as half-watermelon.  i was dumbfounded as to what i was looking at.  it seemed as if i was seeing only half of the object, then the light went out, having lasted only approximately 5 seconds.

i laid there briefly trying to compute what i had just seen.  then i asked the younger boy laying next to me, "did you see that?"  he answered, "yes."

we both laid there for a few more seconds, apparently neither one of us knowing what else to say.  i suddenly had a feeling of something akin to dread, and a strong desire to get inside with my family, for security.

i didn't say anything to my parents, as i had learned from experience that my step-father dismissed any notions of such paranormal activities.

sometime later i was plagued by "grey wolf" dreams.  vague, and not able to place when, where, and how until much later in life.

also in the time frame i had a nightmare in which i woke up the entire family screaming, cowering in a corner of my bedroom.  i only know this because my family brought it to my attention, although i had absolutely no memory of it.
content.summary: Hovered straight above, light came on, half-watermellon shape and coloring.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from an evening activity on thursday night, march 23, 2017. when i exited my car in the driveway, i looked up to see what stars were visible, something i do most evenings that i am out. i saw an unusually bright white object between two trees on the easterly side of our property. the house next to do sits lower than our house and their lights were all on. the object i observed was framed by two of their trees and about two inches above the neighbors roof as i extended my arm and measured with my fingers from the roof to the object. i watched the object for several minutes then decided to go into the house to get my sony cybershot dsc rx100 camera which takes good night photos compared to my iphone camera. when i went back outside maybe two minutes later i was happy to see the object in the same place, framed by the two trees. it didn't seem to have moved at all. i took many photos hoping that some would come out. i just downloaded my photos and to my surprise two came out especially clearly.

on january 30, 2017 i had a sighting in the same easterly direction. i submitted a photo to maryland mufon with photos. i have looked in the same direction for other sightings in the last two months and saw nothing unusual. this is the second sighting of a white hovering object very low in the sky at an unknown distance, but not close up. i needed to zoom in with my camera to capture the photos i took.

i wrote this out before and submitted it. i don't know why it did not go out but maybe the menu below "submit ufo sighting" does not work. if you have two reports that is why. i didn't see the submit button under the "i understand ....." part of the form. this time i copied the text in case it happens again.
content.summary: 10 minute night sighting from my driveway in baltimore city of a bright white i observed a bright white object stationary low in the eastern sky at 9:15pm on march 23, 2017. no other objects/stars were visible except for a passing plane.

content.detailedDescription: On march 5th at about 10pm. i went outside to let my dog go to bathroom.L look up at the night sky and notice this large orb surrounded by the bright estate blue glow l have ever seen.Lt began to move around.After a few minutes it separated into two orbs,they moved apart and then returned facing each other, both orbs changed into human like faces they appeared to be communicotine to each other their lower jaws were moving as if speaking to each other.L felt no fear a sense of serenity  came over me.Next l raised my hand and try ed to get its attention after a few minutes l made the sign of a star at them.After that what l can only describe as a massive clear tube began to drop from the orb in my direction on the edge of the tube were rainbow colors about half way down it stopped and l just stood there and observed it during all this l was taking video and pictures of it,finally it disappeared in an instant.The next day l showed the video to two friends they could not believe it.  do you know of anyone else that may have witnessed  this on march 5,2017 ?
content.summary: Looked up in sky seeing a white glowing orb with bright blue glowing around perimeter, orb separated into two,one stop off to one direction then returned to the other both orbs changed shape and formed human like faces and the bottom jaws began to move  a

content.detailedDescription:
Fulham, london walking to a cafe. airspace is busy but on this occasion i looked at and saw a star like object about 7 aircraft widths to the left of the passenger aircraft. then noticed several lights to the right of the aircraft as i looked up: about 7, 12 and 15 aircraft widths to the right. they followed the aircraft and continued to follow it, keeping the same relative distance, as it banked gently toward a more northerly path. 

at first i thought they were balloons reflecting bright sunlight - i've seen some rarely - but thes lights remained at a constant speed, had a smooth direction and all turned relative to each other, and at same distance from each other. also, they seems to emit a constant light and not reflect it, whereas balloons change intensity as they tilt relative to me/observer and the sun.

the aircraft wasn't landing at a london airport, those are
only a few thousand feet above observer-point and the aircraft had a vapour trail and i should imagine it was over 15-20,000 ft above me.

aircraft and light were obscured by city housing then.
content.summary: Five star like, following aircraft.In full sunshine

content.detailedDescription: Aliens crazy things
content.summary: Aliens look like space ships

content.detailedDescription:
(787) 360-2016
in september 10, 2016 at 1:00pm a neighbor and friend of mine saw a light in the sky. looking east some 30-40 degrees altitude with a transparent blue sky. he was curious since the light was so bright in daylight. two hours later he spotted the light with his wife at the same location. they argue about the object identification for some time. at 6pm he was amazed when he noticed that the light was still in the same place that he decided to take a photograph with his mobile phone. 

two days later he shared the photos with me. i'm a physicist with a bachelors degree and an amateur astronomer for the last 24 years. after a short conversation i discarded some possible explanations like a planet, an airplane, a satellite which are the most common answers. my doubts became higher when i zoomed the photo. there is a triangular shape object that emits the light. i've attached the photos for your consideration. i'm a science guy but there are some instances when the science can't explain everything. let me know if you need additional info regarding this event.
content.summary: Triangle shape object with strong light. object remained stationary for more than 4hrs

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have taken to time lapse, especially at night and star trails over the past few months and have captured alot that many would consider ufo's. through various websites that let you identify satellites i have been able to identify every one.  this time, i cannot and know this isn't satellites because it's obviously in atmosphere. 

anyway, when going through my images, there is a series  with a yellow "glowstick" look to it. when it comes into view it is below the tree line but seems to split into two. 

i would highly suspect consumer drone but it splits in two and moves in a formation of sorts. 

your service will not let me upload all 27 pictures that make up the sequence. please give me a way to do so. i tried to make the main part where the objects come into view the first three photos. the sequence is out of order and i cannot seem to change it.
content.summary: Caught during timelapse - cannot identify

content.detailedDescription:
Bonjour 
l observation c est faite en décembre  2015 c étais une sphère énorme de couleur terre qui nous a suivi mon ex ami et mon petit garçon de l hôpital à notre domicile 
cdt saliha kahoul
content.summary: Big sphere

content.detailedDescription:
About 9pm i went to window, saw the light ( looked like a star ) but it was
really low to ground...Maybe 1,000 ft up. i filmed it for 15 minutes, and
it started out over my apt's about 5,000 ft maybe...And proceeded to go
lower and lower, and moved very slowly, almost stationary looking. it moved
from one part of the sky to another within 15 min. it was not a plane, nor
a helicopter or jet. it looks like a star...But does not act like one, in
my opinion. this same star seems to come around, not on a regular basis.

i videoed it w/ my cell phone. i'm used to that particular "star" coming
around my apt's at night, so i never get afraid. once i was in my vehicle
and it seemed like that same "star" was "communicating w/ me back...As i
was using my headlights, turning them off an on randomly. the "star" was
doing the same,...It would blink out, and then come back very bright or
just fade a little. but it would shrink to a red ball many times. that is
when i drew the "happy face" on my windshield. then a few months later i saw that "happy face" in the volcano pic that came out on internet. maybe
that was just a coincidence i suppose.

anyways, i try to make sense of things first, before i report to mufon...I
just don't know if its a star or not. thank u all for the great work u do !
mufon is important for alot of people.       

                                                     blessings ~
content.summary: Starlike low, moved very slowly across sky, gone in 15 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Frequently observe these orbs.  decided to put out game cams.  we were astonished that the cam caught the orb via motion and once we zoomed in on the picture and adjusted the picture with basic contrast adjustments we were amazed.  around 6 people have observed this orb phenomena over the last six months.  the object typically hovers for approximately 15-20 minutes and disappears. this sighting happens on our sheep farm usually around midnight to 6 am.
the first time this was observed was around sept 2016.  several farm hands noticed two orbs floating in the pasture.  the evening was very quiet.  two orbs floated back and forth appx 100 yards away from the observers.  my brother yelled "hey!, who's out there and whats your business here?",  the orbs stopped moving and sticks could be heard breaking as they exited on the backside of our main pasture;  mind you, all our sheep are locked up in a barn at night.  my farm hands stood there watching the object(s) daring each other to go down there.  there's no way it was an sheep or deer moving about.  the two orbs exited the property to the east and disappeared.

there have been various other "pop-up" occurances between then and present day.  we typically watch it from the top of the pasture and typically it goes away.

one morning in jan 2017 the orb had 'woke up' all our farm animals;  we went outside the house and walked towards the barn;  all the animals were nervous and 'vocal';  making noise like a predator was near or someone they didn't know;  we walked to the barn and watched the 'single' orb this time just hovering around 4-6' off the ground;  appx 80 yards facing south from our perspective.

during the last observance this march (2017);  we had the game cam setup and captured those images;  i tried driving my truck to the opposite side from my brothers viewpoint.  after watching and talking to my brother via facetime video;  the object took off and hovered over the home location and disappeared.

i was reluctant to post this b/c i don't want any attention brought to my farm or family;  im a local public official and wish to remain anonymouse but would be interested in talking to a field investigator.
content.summary: Watched the orb lift off and exit as the sun came up,  me and brother witnessed from 2 different positions

content.detailedDescription: I was on back porch looking at the stars and watching planes flying by then a briteley lite hellcopter ful by thats when the south strait at me i stud up to try to get good look at it but it so fast my bulding blocked my vuwe wow!!!!!!
content.summary: 2 red lights streaked from south to north at a incredbel speed

content.detailedDescription: Driving  from picking  my children when i noticed this bright object coming down  the sky in somewhat a zigzag motion. it stopped and hovered. i told my daughter to look as well as son. we looked in amazement as  object just hovered and it started tilting then started to move. the highway started to turn when i lost sight  it, but my daughter was able to follow it. she said  tilted more, and red and green bright lights were visible. it disappeared for a few seconds then came back. this happened twice. then we lost view of it.
content.summary: Bright white boomerang shape with with a circle in center. glowing white green and red.

content.detailedDescription:
I run a night vision camera 24/7 pointed up at the sky through my bedroom window facing west. these objects seem to come from afar(up to 9 at one sighting)and very slowly appear closer and closer and spread apart.They are all cylinder shape with a thick black bottom and top.Sometimes two or even three will hook up together side by side.The amazing thing about night vision camera videoing is that although the objects are right there in front of you on the monitor screen--they can't be seen by the human eye. i have read about what is really going on in space when revealed with using night vision.
now--the amazing thing is that in order to zoom in to the object in the video;i had to use my iphone 6 plus;--that when zoomed to as far as i could, you can see in the photo i have how the object turns into a saucer with identical domes on top and bottom of the craft! very interesting. now i am just going to take a wild stab here and suggest that these objects are actually the interior propulsion systems.
mark cerone-videos taken around 3-3-to 3-15-2017
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shot with night vision camera during daytime. when zoomed into max--changed to saucer shape

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work. i was turning onto the road that goes to my home when i saw a very bright white light to my left in the sky. at first i thought i was witnessing a large meteorite burning up. 
then the light was gone and a thin cylinder cigar shaped object was there. it did not move. i stopped and watched it for a few minute to see if it would move. never changed position while i was watching. other vehicles were coming so i started driving again and lost sight behind a row of trees. i looked for it at the next clearing but it was gone. my phone doesn't take good pictures at distance so i did not get any.
at first i thought it was a meteor, as i drove the rest of the way home i thought that maybe i had witnessed something different. i checked flights in the area at the time i saw this and there were no flights anywhere close. thanks for reading my account and i hope you can solve this.
content.summary: Super bright white light, then no light and stationary object hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Silvery star shaped speck in sky. large enough to see. hovered in same place, then disappeared and reappeared within seconds and remained stationary. only lasted about 2 mins.
saw it on 03 23 and 3 24 around same time, 5:30pm to 7pm, both days. 
first sighting on 03232017, there were 3 dark vapor trails after it disappeared. i was driving home on route 10 aka willow grove rd with my 2 children, ages 11 and 8, and we all saw the same thing.
content.summary: Silvery star shaped object in sky, stationary/hovering...Appeared then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Když mi bylo zhruba 12-13 let tak jsme s mým spolužákem v létě o prázdninách jezdili na kolech a po setmění,než jsme chtěli jet domů (bylo cca kolem 10 - 11 hodiny protože vím že už byla tma) jsme ještě zajeli za školu a chvíli jsme tam jezdili,povídali si a po chvíli jsem si všiml na obloze směrem k ruzyňskému letišti že je na obloze o dost větší bílé světlo než aby to bylo od letadel.Já jsem na letišti s ultralehkými letadly vyrůstal a jelikož bydlím v lubné u rakovníka tak nad námi každou chvíli proletí dopravní letadla z velké británie atd.. takže jsem moc dobře věděl že se o klasické dopravní letadlo nejedná.
upozornil jsem svého spolužáka ale ten nevěřil že by to mohli být mimozemšťané až do doby kdy se to k nám neuvěřitelnou rychlostí přiblížilo a to světlo bylo mnohem větší.Mělo to rozměry cca jako zdejší tělocvična a půl.Byli jsme tak vyděšení že jsme se schovali ke zdi tělocvičny protože jsme nevěděli jaké s námi mají úmysly,zda jsou přátelští či nikoliv.
po chvíli celý rozklepaný jsem vykoukl zda tam ještě to světlo je ale už tam nebylo.Vylezli jsme a přemýšleli,co to bylo a tak.Po chvilce jsem se koukl směrem k bitovkám které jsou nedaleko a byl vidět kousek od bytovek létající talíř ale už nesvítil tak jako před tím.Byl tmavý jako když ohřejete železo ve víhni a rychle ho strčíte do vody (čili kalení).Chvíli to tam stálo na místě,pak se to jakoby zhouplo a neuvěřitelně rychle to zmizelo směrem do atmosféry. pamatuji si i přesný tvar ale zde by se mi to špatně popisovalo.
dodnes to mám před očima.Na takový zážitek se snad nedá zapomenout.

this report is from prague,czech republic from summer 1996 or 1997, the witness was 12-13. this happened close to the airport but it was not a plane. the object with bright light was much bigger than a plane and when the witness mentioned to his friend that this could be ets the light very abruptly came really close to them and stopped. it was bigger than the gym building where they were hiding behind. they were scared and later (not sure how much later) when he came out to look at it, he saw a flying saucer further away above residential area hovering, much darker now (dark orange changing to black) and then shortly after that the object disappeared very fast into the atmosphere.
the duration entered is approximate
content.summary: Information only - entered by marketa

content.detailedDescription:
Walking on seafront, 3 objects flying out to sea. moved around, almost like they were playing. there was no sound i could hear but it was quite windy. they were out to sea between the de la warr pavilion and the sovereign lighthouse. (it wasnt as far out as the light house and was well above it, the lighthouse was in view at all times)

after about 15 minutes of moving the shot up into the clouds at an incredible speed. not much above the sea, to cloud level in around 6 seconds.

my phone was fully charged as was my nike wrist band, but the wouldn't operate. another person caught the last minute of the display & had the same issue
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 dancing objects out to sea

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and making cigarettes then i took unused tobacco in small dust pan out my front door to throw them out at approx. 2am . when i stepped back up on the porch i glanced to my left as i caught something bright above the clouds. first the light sort of twinkled red then they turned white the were a long horizontal line with a clear amount of space between them . at first i thought maybe a jet or air plane but it made no noise and it did not move there was a star farther right of to the south of it so i could clearly determine it was not moving from its position. at first i had no real reaction other than curiosity then i realized what ever it was it did not belong there . some tines i would lose sight of it due to clouds going under it and then i would see it. then i knew my wife had to see this so about 210 am i woke her up then she came out and we both looked at it with our 50 mm binoculars . still the whole time could not make ou a shape but by the size of the lights and the distance from the first to the last light it was the largest thing or my wife have ever seen in the sky and i have seen very large air craft when i was in the usmc .After 20 to 30 min. it just vanished . i watched for a long time but it was gone . some times the star is there but no lights . it is now 515 am and i still am looking . saw star between cloud break but no lights . to tell you the truth i did not call the sheriff because i did not want to sound like a quack so i looked you up on the internet i would be very interested to know if anybody else saw it or if it showed up on radar. i can,t believe this did not or would not show up on radar. i have always heard of people seeing the things and i try to keep an open mind about most things but i never in my wildest dream thought i would see one or my wife .Still not really under standing what we saw i just know it was something we have no explanation for. i just want to know what we saw?
content.summary: Long string of large lights above cloude cover first red then white for 20 min then gone .

content.detailedDescription:
This event take place at my village pakri ara,bihar. on occaion of puja at our newly build house, i am filming my daughter activities on top of the roof. after 4 days i have watched that vedio and found that something moving very fast in this vedio from west to east. then i taken screen shot of my mobile phone to see what is this?. i have watched many episodes on history channel on this matter  and want to share with you to.
regards
prashant kumar
content.summary: shooting vedio of my2 yrs daugther on 15th march on top of the roof in my village

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at the sky at some contrails and the patterns they were making. i did not see any planes in the area when i looked to the left and saw what looked like a white egg with another orb of light to the right of it. it stood stationary in the sky for seven seconds and when i turned to ask a coworker what this was in the sky it had dissapeared. i stayed looking for another five minutes looking to see if it had moved on to another location but couldn't find it. we live in the country so we have open sky around us. there was maybe one or two clouds in the sky at the time.
content.summary: Looking at some old contrails with no planes in sight when i noticed a white egg shaped object with another smaller white light or orb to the right of it hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my son were driving towards our home when he noticed the object hovering. there was no noise and the object moved erratically after being noticed. i was convinced this couldn't be a balloon a
or an airplane as no such object can move like that.It seemed to fade in and out of different spots in the sky. it did this twice,moving in an opposing figure eight with flairs at the ends where it faded. the object moved with such speed before disappearing. it faded out for a second time and didn't reappear. when we saw it we weren't sure what to,make of it but after we were sure it wasn't a weather balloon or an airplane.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The object seemed to glow and hover as it changed direction. it also faded in and out in various places.

content.detailedDescription:
the photograph was taken when spent with my brothers from the coast to riobamba, approximately 20 km from the shooting site.  the intention of photography was done at the volcano chimborazo, when suddenly look at the ufo in the bottom and two minutes after ascent, as the photography has. no, we stopped at the site and spent




la fotografia fue tomada cuando regresabamos con mis hermanos desde la costa hasta riobamba, a 20 km aproximado del sitio fotografiado.  la intencion  de la fotografia fue hacerlo al volcan chimborazo, cuando subitamente observamos el ovni en la parte baja  y dos minutos despues  ascendio, conforme consta la fotografia. no nos detuvimos en el sitio y pasamos de largo hacia el lugar de destino.  es lo que puedo informar en honor a la verdad. muchas gracias
content.summary: Was a wonderfull an very interestin spectacle

content.detailedDescription: The witness reported:  three times during three straight weeks, people at my cabin near grantsburg, wi saw round glowing objects.  the first sighting was by workers at my cabin.  the moon was out.  they saw 3 ufos, stopping and going to the right, then stopping and going to the left.  this was over a span of 30 minutes.  i told my lady friend about them.  we went out to the cabin; at 11:00 pm we were sitting by the fire outside.  we saw 4 objects, not way up, close enough to see that they were round, for 15 minutes.  they were of a yellowish-gray tint.  the next week, we saw the same ufos again; this time there were ten witnesses.  they left to go to bed, while my son and i stayed up and sat around the fire.  one came over and hovered above us much lower than the others.  it was circular and had a smaller circle in the middle of the bottom.  it took off fast.  the next week i called the wisconsin dnr office in grantsburg.  he said “we are getting these reports all the time, from people in the area.  we tried to find out what they are and we can’t find out anything.”  in all of these sightings, the objects came from the nw and left to the se.
content.summary: Three times during three straight weeks, people at my cabin near grantsburg, wi saw round objects.

content.detailedDescription: This craft appeared out of cloud coverage, i observed it for 5min and it moved in a straight libe. as if on a flight path. however, it was not at an altitude contingent with commercial aircraft in the area. the shape and size was not that of a small private plane or commercial / military aircraft. this round, highly reflective craft moved from west to east, and disappeared into cloud cover. i watched for a half hour and never saw it emerge, however i did see 2 commercial flights at approx 30,00 ft pass over. the orb was gone, no sign or sight of it again. this was, by, no doubt, something not of a terrestrial design. i've never seen something like this just disappear, i have seen other ufos, but never in this are. i am convinced this was a true ufo.
content.summary: This craft was low on the horizon. came out of cloud cover and disappeared in clouds. no contrail, round and moving at a slow rate of speed. 24 yrs in the military, and i have only seen this a few times before, all of which i can't explain.

content.detailedDescription:
I see glowing orange sphere with a rotating dark circles (rotated around the sphere - the ball was inside of the ring). 
sphere flew from ne straight at the military airport.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere with a rotating dark circles.

content.detailedDescription:
7034399572
standing outside, noticed airplane being followed by spherical object, watched for about half a minute, then object turned into about 50 other. these now started flying in all directions and disappeared. 5 minutes later, objects all came and regrouped out of nowhere, at this point there were about 70, all stopped, started flashing , then at once disappeared
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere following plane then turned into 40-60 smaller ones, the flew away in all directions, 5 min later all came back and at once disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on my third floor deck with my mate and looking straight at jupiter facing se. i sky-watch every night when i go out to smoke. there were some scattered clouds, but none immediately around jupiter and it's travel companion spica.  i had noticed a hole in the clouds in this general area several times earlier in the day, as if something kept punching a distinctly round hole in them. it was curious enough that i took pictures, as it didn't seem natural.  it was within another of these 'cloud holes' that jupiter was observed.  while staring at it, a very brief lightning like flash in a clear cut ovoid shape flashed to the slightly upper right of jupiter and spica. because i had been staring in the dark, the shape of the flash imprinted on my retinas, and i could see it's distinct, sharp edged shape for several seconds. it was slightly larger than my fist at arm's length. my mate had his back turned, but caught my reaction, which was a loud "what the h_l was that !!! it was definitely not lightning, definitely not a spotlight, as it was not projected onto a cloud, but rather appeared in the one area that had no clouds.  it was so fast that had i not been staring at it i would have wondered where the flash came from. my mate perceived the flash even though he had his back turned. i have never seen anything like it. the photo i submitted is of the area of flash showing the hole in the clouds where this appeared. i set the camera to 1600 asa for more detail.
content.summary: Lightning speed flash of large distinct oval to right of jupiter

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being made by the fi assigned to follow up on the witness's phone call to mufon, as the witness does not have a working computer.
the witness related many instances of anomalous events she has experienced in her 55 years, but this report is only of an event she experienced on july 8, 2016 on the deck of her home, at twilight.  she had the feeling she wasn't alone, then noticed a transparent, oval vibrating form in front of a chair across from her.  she took a picture of it with her i phone, and found an image behind her reflected in a mirrored votive infinity candle holder in a wrought iron holder across from her.  the image looked like a small gray with three fingers.  she was very astounded (thinking omg and "wt?").  she immediately sent the picture to her brother who agreed with her interpretation.
content.summary: Witness saw a transparent, vibrating, oval form in front of her on her deck, took a picture with her i phone, and found a reflection of a small gray behind her in a mirrored votive candle holder that was in front of her.
